pageProduct.name: Scholl Clotrimazole Athletes Foot Cream 50g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Clotrimazole Athlete's Foot Cream is an antifungal treatment for Athlete's food (Tinea Pedis).

Scholl Clotrimazole Athlete's Foot Cream is an antifungal treatment for Athlete's Foot (Tinea Pedis).

DIRECTIONS FOR USE:

·  Clean and dry the affected area thoroughly.

·  Apply a thin layer of cream to the affected area and rub in gently, two to three times daily.

·   Continue treatment for 2 weeks after symptoms disappear to avoid recurrence.

·   Regular application is essential for successful treatment.

Size: 50g

KEY FEATURES

• Antifungal Treatment for Athlete's Foot (Tinea Pedis)
• Treat and Beat Athlete's Foot
• Clotrimazole 10mg/g (1% w/w)

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
Contains: Benzyl Alcohol as preservative.

Do not use if seal at end of tube is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Clotrimazole 10mg/g (1% w/w)

Contains: Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

- Clean and dry the affected area thoroughly.
- Apply a thin layer of cream to the affected area and rub in gently, two to three times daily.
- Continue treatment for 2 weeks after symptoms disappear to avoid recurrence.
- Regular application is essential for successful treatment.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
